caption:
Prayer is an opportunity to commune with the source beyond our understanding— the miracle power that breathes life into our world as we know it. Our faith in the light even amid unimaginable darkness. 🕯️ 

Prayer is language that doesn’t include a demand, it simply offers its gratitude for it ALL. For life itself. 

Prayer and meditation is a way to open a conversation with existence, to say thank you, by noticing what is good, what is given to us, for all that stirs awe in our hearts. 

On this #nationaldayofprayer, look around you in this moment, connect with the life within you, what miracle do you notice here now?
